name: Watcher (Abazel)
description:
Dive into an action-filled adventure where your play as a drug-addicted superhero called Watcher whose goal is to end all evil that is plaguing the world. Will you accomplish your goal or will you let evil go out of control

At each level, you may find various power up’s that give different effects such as alcohol which stops you from losing health, cocaine that gives you super speed,  your superhero outfit which lets you fly and many more

The controls are very easy to learn

AD/Left or Right Arrow to move

Space to Jump

Left Click to Fire
